svg-examples.example: The following Scalable Vector Graphics document describes a blue-filled and black-stroked rectangle. <svg width="100%" height="100%" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <rect width="300" height="100" style="fill:rgb(0,0,255);stroke-width:1; stroke:rgb(0,0,0)"/> </svg>
